text.p: True or false: If [mathjaxinline]v[/mathjaxinline] and [mathjaxinline]w[/mathjaxinline] are orthogonal, and [mathjaxinline]u[/mathjaxinline] is orthogonal to both [mathjaxinline]v[/mathjaxinline] and to [mathjaxinline]w[/mathjaxinline], then the list [mathjaxinline]\{ u; v; w\}[/mathjaxinline] must be linearly independent.

font.p: The list is an orthogonal list, but one of the vectors could be [mathjaxinline]\mathbf{0}[/mathjaxinline].
